data.title: Amitabh Bachchan pens a note on his 50th wedding anniversary with Jaya Bachchan
data.meta_description: Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan have been married for 50 years, on their wedding anniversary Big B shares a note.
data.text:
Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan celebrate their 50th wedding anniversary today. The stars tied the knot on June 3, 1973. Since then, they have been one of B-town's most loved couples. To mark the occasion, Amitabh penned a sweet note on his blog.

Amitabh Bachchan wrote, "June 3 dawns in a few .. and the years be counted as 50 .. love respect and gratitude for the wishes, that have come and perhaps shall come .."

Meanwhile, Amitabh and Jaya's daughter Shweta Bachchan shared a rare throwback pic of her parents and wrote, "Happy 50th parents ~ now you're "Golden" once on being asked what the secret to a long marriage is, my mother answered - love, and I think my father was - the wife is always right. That's the long & short of it !!"

Check it out here:

SEE ALSO: 10 throwback pics of Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan serving couple goals

Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan reportedly met at a film institute and went on to star in several iconic films together.
